name: The West Flemish Pub Experience
description: Alas! Due to unforeseen circumstances involving a virus, bars and pubs in all of West Flanders are closed until further notice! But once again technology will save our ass. This VR experience simulates the experience of sitting in an authentic West Flemish pub. It even has a custom translator function for those who have a slight difficulty with understanding the authentic West Flemish dialect. Come in and enjoy your time!
